mapper.sql: goods_url, sid, category_url, goods_name, price, comment, favorable_rate, seller, dt
mapper.insert:
insert into yhd_category_new_arrival
goods_url,
sid,
category_url,
goods_name,
price,
comment,
favorable_rate,
seller,
dt,
#{goodsUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{categoryUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{comment,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{favorableRate,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{seller,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update yhd_category_new_arrival
category_url = #{categoryUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_name = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
comment = #{comment,jdbcType=INTEGER},
favorable_rate = #{favorableRate,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
seller = #{seller,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dt = #{dt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where goods_url = #{goodsUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and sid = #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select a.* from yhd_category_new_arrival a join bl_category_performance_basic b on b.category_sid = #{categorySid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.category_url = b.yhd_category_url
ORDER BY ${columnOrder}
